page.title: 12FAMILY LIFE - MARILENA SIMI
page.content: My name is Marilena Simi. I live in Abbey Road, Blackpool. I live with my mum, dad and two brothers Roberto and Stefano. We have Italian names because my dad is Italian. I start the day by getting up, but I do not like it, and would rather stay in bed. After I have gone to school, my mum goes to work, while my dad stays in bed (this is because he works in Mama's Restaurant during the evening). My big brother who has left school goes to work, while Stefano goes to the nearby Secondary School. Sunday is the only day when we are all together, but we do have long holidays together, because my dad goes back to Italy to work in his hotel for three months of the year, and we often join him there for up to six to eight weeks.
